issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
We have developed a static analysis tool [NPEDetector|https://github.com/lujiefsi/NPEDetector] to find some potential NPE, just as descroped in HDFS-13451. We found another two bug or bad practice after improve the tool.

attach the patch here

# Is it valid for {{representativeRecord}} to return null?  If no, ignoring it is wrong. 
# I don't see how flipping the args in the assert matters since the LHS is "more likely" (yet unlikely) to be null?
